price: 135. Waxaan idiinka cabsan (oo digayaa) cadaab Maalin daran.
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
